}}'''Elfhild''' was the wife of King [[Théoden]].

==History==
Elfhild died in childbirth, leaving Théoden a widower and [[Théodred]] motherless. At the time of the [[War of the Ring]], Rohan had been without a queen for forty years.<ref>{{App|Eorl}}</ref>
